page.title: 04LONG LAWFORD II
page.content:
Amenities & attractions cont.
In the centre of Long Lawford stands a combined first and middle school.This was founded by the Newbold Board of Education on the 15th of January 1877.In 1961 a series of new buildings were constructed in three stages.14 years later a swimming pool was built with money provided by the Parent Teachers Association.Computers and other sophisticated technological equipment has been bought for the school in the last 12 months. At present the school has about 208 pupils and 10 staff,which is liable to be lowered to 9 in the near future.Children come to the school at the age of 5 and leave at 12 having taken the 12+ examination to decide their future secondary school.
